about_the_game:
Liar’s Bet

Step into the ultimate game of deception, deduction, and daring bets! Liar's Bet is a fast-paced multiplayer game where bluffing and bravado are your best friends… or your biggest downfall. Gather with friends or challenge players online in thrilling rounds where each player bets on the truth of each other's claims. Can you spot the lie, or will you lose it all by calling a bluff?

Features:

  • Multiplayer Mayhem – Play with up to 4 friends online. No two games are the same!

  • Bluff or Be Bluffed – Bet on truths, call out lies, or double down on your bets to raise the stakes!

  • Unique Characters – Choose from quirky avatars with unique looks.

  • Fun gadgets and tools – Use fun gadgets and tools to play around with.

  • Interactive Environments – Play in themed locations that set the mood for intense bluffs and big wins.

  • Quick Rounds, Big Wins – Each round is fast and furious—perfect for pick-up-and-play fun!

  • Voice chat, text chat - Have fun talking to other players, socialize, and play mind games on your fellow players by using voice chat or text chat.

Description:

Liar's Bet is all about reading people, taking risks, and turning those little white lies into big wins. It’s a game of quick thinking, good guesses, and maybe a little luck! Will you be the last one standing, or will your friends see through your bluffs? Join the game where lying is half the fun... and losing is never the end!

Are you ready to bet on a lie?

Put on your best poker face, grab your friends, and jump into the thrilling world of Liar’s Bet.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May work with even lower specs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
